description.skilled: Can ride nay beast if tamed

description.all: Movement speed while mounted is double normal speed.

All melee attacks from a mounted position towards unmounted target have their damage doubled.
Attacks on the other mounted targets deal normal damage.

Target up to 3 enemies within a 5 foot radius of each other and charge them at full speed. In addition to any charge attack made while mounted you can trample up to 3 additional targets. If successful targets each take D% as Blunt Physical Damage.
Uses STR + roll for accuracy.
